## Create test data 

```{r build_test_data}
set.seed( 1123581321 )

identifier <- 1:10
alphas <- sample( letters, size = 10, replace = TRUE)
integer <- sample( 1000:1999, size = 10, replace = TRUE )
numerics <- rnorm( 10, mean = 6 , sd = 2 )
numerics <- round( numerics, 2 )
numerics <- ifelse( numerics < 1, 1, numerics )

test_tible <- tibble( id, aphas, integer, numerics )
```
